Veteran Ascalon:
Good! Then first, go and visit my old friend Mason. He was a comrade of mine. We used to fight together in the battlefields in part of the Iron Rose. Although he has retired now, I am sure he is informed more than anyone else about the invaders who are threatening the townsmen of Dion. Perhaps he might even pick up a spear and head off to the battlefields, stimulated by your young spirits...
I heard that Mason, the master of spears, is living happily with his family somewhere in Southern Dion. If you bring this letter which has my stamp on it, he will greet you.
